article.title: koha-run-backups
article.info:
Koha is the first free software library automation package.
The Koha Community http://koha-community.org/

refnamediv.refpurpose: Performs backups of the koha installations on the system, except an instance called 'demo'.

listitem.para: The directory that the resulting files will be placed into (default: /var/spool/koha).
The number of days to keep backups around for (default: 2).
Exclude Zebra indexes from the backups (default: false).

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: koha-run-backups allows automation of backing up the koha data and configuration to the filesystem. It will keep the past so many backups, discarding older ones. This script uses koha-dump to do the actual backup.
If there is an instance called 'demo', it will be skipped by this script.
Note: backups produced using this tool can be restored using koha-restore.
